headline.main: If It Feels Good, Don't Do It
Aided by Newer Products, 3 Drug Makers Post Higher Profits

docs.lead_paragraph: Three big drug companies reported higher second-quarter profits yesterday, as increased sales of their flagship and newer medicines were only partly offset by declines in older products. The American Home Products Corporation, maker of Advil pain reliever and Centrum vitamins, increased profits by 31 percent from the corresponding quarter last year.
